Introduction

Wang QiuRu (Chinese: 王秋茹, Korean: 왕추루) is a Chinese singer, member of SNH48's Team SII and former member of SHY48.
She participated on Korean survival show 'Girls Planet 999' and ranked 32nd (C-Group).

Team History:
[2017.04.29] - Joined SHY48 as a Research Student.
[2019.01.19] - Transferred to SNH48 Overseas Trainee.
[2020.03.07] - Transferred to SNH48 Team SII.

STAR48:
Jan 1, 2018-Mar 22, 2023
